description: Deliciously crusted cutlets with a slightly warm and tangy aftertaste.
keywords: Roast lamb,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Lamb Persillade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the rack of lamb into cutlets. Pan fry the cutlets on a non-stick pan for 30 seconds on each side to seal them and then set to one side and allow to cool.
Mix the rest of the ingredients together in a bowl apart from the mustard and oil and ensure they are combined fully.
Now cover the meat on the cutlets with the mustard and then evenly spread the crust mix on each cutlet evenly.
Pan fry the crusted cutlets on the non-stick pan with the canola oil for about 2 minutes on each side until the crust starts to brown before serving.
